General.Name: Hubei Goto Biopharm Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Hubei Goto Biopharm Co.,Ltd. engages in the production and sale of steroid hormone API's and intermediates in China. It offers starting materials, such as 9a-hydroxy-4-androstenedione(9a-OHAD), bisnoralcohol(BA), sitolactone, 1.4-androstadienedione(ADD), and 4-androstenedione(4-AD); intermediates, including estrogens, progesterone, nonsteroids, other hormones, and corticosteroids; and other pharmaceutical raw materials. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Yicheng, China.
